body.desc: Click the character to learn, and make sure speaker is on.

about.text: This app is developed with the aim of helping students who are learning Japanese Language and find difficult in remembering characters. You can learn how a character is correctly drawn and how it is pronounced on `Learn` page, able to mark characters difficult, and can practice those characters randomly in `Practice` Page. Choose a practice type, set delay and write down what you hear and then check if they are correct when the audio has finished.

notFound.text: Our apologies, but we couldn't find that page. Is it possible that you found a bad link?
